projects.description: A comprehensive Incentive Management System developed for FIAT AUTOMOBILE, enabling the sales team to efficiently manage and optimize incentive strategies and discount offers.
projects.responsibility: Designed and developed responsive web pages to ensure a seamless user experience across the application.

projects.description: A robust Optical Fiber Management System tailored for COMCAST CORPORATION, facilitating efficient monitoring, maintenance, and management of their extensive optical fiber network.
projects.responsibility: Engineered comprehensive backend solutions including database schema design and API development, ensuring high performance and scalability.

projects.description: An integrated Golf Course Management System designed to facilitate the efficient management and maintenance of golf course infrastructures, including ponds, turf, trees, and other facilities.
projects.responsibility: Developed backend database schemas and APIs alongside user-friendly web interfaces to enhance system functionality and user engagement.

projects.projectName: A HealthCare App for the EKG Review
projects.description: A HIPAA-compliant healthcare application that enables patients to securely share their EKG data and receive expert reviews from a team of institutional doctors, streamlining remote diagnostics.
projects.responsibility: Architected and implemented secure backend database schemas and APIs, integrated payment gateways, ensured HIPAA compliance, and developed a responsive front-end interface.

projects.description: A comprehensive Real-Estate Rent Management System that empowers real estate professionals to track properties and tenants, while streamlining the tenant onboarding process.
projects.responsibility: Developed robust backend database schemas and APIs, and crafted responsive web pages to enhance operational efficiency and user engagement.

projects.client: An individual Sports Institution From the USA
projects.description: An innovative Sports Education-Tech Management System that enables sports institutions and coaches to effectively manage classes, events, registrations, scorecards, and schedules.
projects.responsibility: Engineered secure backend database schemas and APIs, and developed dynamic, responsive web pages to facilitate efficient system operations.

projects.description: A robust, real-time chat application developed to enable seamless and efficient communication using modern web technologies.
projects.responsibility: Led the end-to-end development process, from conceptualization and design to deployment, ensuring optimal functionality and user experience.
